publications.title: The Mystery of Venezuela's Oil: Why the World's Largest Reserves Are Barely Being Pumped
publications.abstract: Venezuela sits on more barrels of oil than Saudi Arabia. So why does it pump less than 1% of the global supply?

publications.title: Unilateral Sanctions, Food Insecurity and Food Sovereignty Construction in Venezuela: Challenges and Prospects for Zero Hunger in a Transforming Petrostate
publications.abstract: Natalia Burdynska Schuurman researched Venezuela's construction of food sovereignty under the Bolivarian Revolution and amid US sanctions.
